overview:
Tom Grasty is the co-founder of Stroome, a collaborative video editing and publishing platform designed to simplify the production of video news. Named an â€œInnovator to Watchâ€ by the USC Stevens Institute for Innovation in 2009, his journeyman trek through the entertainment, advertising, and internet industries have landed him at places like HBO, DreamWorks and VH1, and resulted in the development of over 100 hours of film, television, documentary and digital properties.

A native of the Tar Heel state, Tom currently lives in Los Angeles.

external_links.title: Tom Grasty: Media Content Creator Helping Students Create Their Own Content Online
